meanings.sent1: The flower upcurled towards the sun for more light.
meanings.sent2: She upcurled her fingers around the handle of the mug.
meanings.sent3: The cat upcurled its tail in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: The smoke upcurled from the chimney into the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The vine upcurled around the trellis, reaching for support.

meanings.definition: Having a curled or twisted upward shape.
meanings.sent1: The upcurled edges of the paper gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had an upcurled style that was popular in the 80s.
meanings.sent3: The upcurled corners of the rug made it look like a smile.
meanings.sent4: The upcurled petals of the flower resembled delicate ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The upcurled lip of the cup prevented spills when pouring.
